title: 12/20: Start or Sit (NFC)! Mike Boone, Aaron Jones and More! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We're almost ready for Week 16, but first we've got the NFC home games to get to and some difficult decisions at QB. So we get the Startometer out (1:56) for the QBs you may be wondering about this week. Matt Ryan, Dak Prescott, Mitchell Trubisky and more ... Dave tells you the Good Luck Player you need to add, and it's an awesome suggestion (8:00)! Then we talk about the weather (11:30) and the news and notes (12:14) before going over some key stats (19:02) about Kyler Murray, Patrick Mahomes, Leonard Fournette and more. Plus "Start, Sit or Flex at Best" (28:00) ... HOU-TB (29:25), LAR-SF (41:00), GB-MIN (49:25), NYG-WAS (57:30), JAC-ATL (1:03:00), ARI-SEA (1:08:00), KC-CHI (1:14:48), DAL-PHI (1:17:50) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Getting into the NFC home games! The QBs are tough calls this week, and we'll talk extensively about the MIN RBs and much more.
